response.overview: The clue is in the title. Jump aboard this fantastical comedy train as Ben Van Der Velde escorts you through his highly imaginative, improvised adventure of frivolous fables, ghostly tales and romping romances. Ben masterfully riffs off his audience to spin an unforgettable yarn that will leave you reeling with laughter and wonderment.
response.title: Ben Van der Velde - Fablemaker
